comments.body: s/Mutation/Revising/g (I think that is the term we will end up going with)

> s/Mutation/Revising/g (I think that is the term we will end up going with)

We starting talking about this as mutation and wrote docs about mutation.  I don't remember discussing a name change.  I don't find "revising" to be a natural word.  If we do decide on a name change after this is in, the newer golang tools allow doing it without much pain.
